item.description:
Over the years, our group has had hundreds of fun events and a lot of great friendships have been formed. Join us for a special celebration for the 5th anniversary of our meet-up group! We will be enjoying a BBQ, drinks, outdoor games and some board games. Guests are asked for a $10 payment at the party to cover the cost of food and supplies. Please bring your own alcohol or other beverage of choice to enjoy at the party!

We can play outdoor games including whiffleball and frisbee, along with some fun board games indoors. Feel free to bring a lawn chair too.

Food will include:

Hamburgers, hotdogs, shrimp, pasta salad, potato salad, cole slaw, fresh corn, salad, cheese/crackers, chips/dips, fruit, desserts, ice cream sundae bar and some other good things too!

If a couple of people would like to come a little earlier and help set up, that would be great- please send me a message. I'll also need a couple of volunteers to help with the grill!

If you would like to carpool, please specify it in your RSVP and members can arrange carpooling with each other. I live on a quiet residential street, so there is plenty of easy, free street parking.

Please only sign up if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, please update your RSVP. I need to have an accurate headcount, so I know how much food to purchase.

We look forward to seeing you for a great summer party! If you are new to the group or haven't been to an event in a while- then be sure to join us.
item.how_to_find_us: Address will be emailed to guests before the event
item.name: Meet Up Anniversary Party, BBQ and Games
